attributes.action: Ensure those with mental health conditions continue to be eligible for PIP
attributes.additional_details: We believe those with mental health conditions must continue to be eligible for Personal Independence Payments (PIP). Many people rely on benefits to survive, and this is not a choice. We believe that taking away lifelines from people who are struggling will cause millions of people's quality of life to reduce even further, and that this could have fatal consequences.
attributes.background: The Government has announced a major review of the disability benefit system, saying this will consider alternatives to cash payments, such as treatment or access to services.
